heading: NEET – Your AI-Powered Preparation Companion
subHeading: Smart learning path designed for NEET aspirants. Explore, practice, test, and revise with AI guidance.
quickIntro: The NEET is India’s national-level entrance exam for admission to MBBS, BDS, AYUSH, and other medical courses. It tests a student’s knowledge of Physics, Chemistry, and Biology from Classes 11 & 12 (NCERT syllabus). With 200 questions (180 to attempt) in 3 hours 20 minutes, NEET evaluates both accuracy and speed. It is your gateway to becoming a doctor. With smart practice and AI-guided revision, you’ll be ready to shine.
